summary: The module provides a suite of helper utilities that automatically generate parameterized test methods and classes for CuPy's test framework. It handles conversion of parameter values to readable identifiers, creation of unique method and class names, safe iteration over parameter collections, Cartesian product computation of parameter dictionaries, and integration with unittest and pytest parameterization mechanisms.
business_intent: Enable systematic creation of multiple test variants from a single test definition to increase coverage and maintainability of CuPy's GPU-accelerated codebase.
